songs.title: Hood Traps
songs.lyrics:
Don’t get caught up in the trap nigga
The hood is just a set up
That’s a fact nigga
Want us dead or in jail that’s a fact nigga
You black so you better watch your back nigga

Don’t get caught up in the trap nigga
The hood is just a set up
That’s a fact nigga
Want us dead or in jail that’s a fact nigga
You black so you better watch your back nigga

Let me welcome everybody to the wild wild west
Where you need a hard hat and a vest
Keep a tall gat or a tat to protect your neck
Cause niggas fight for human life
They haVe no respect
Don’t even need a reason for a nigga to clap foe
Black lives don’t  matter not even to black folks
The ones who get clapped most cause all the dignity
Evaporated with crack smoke
The ghetto is a shit but ti takes what it trap though
Unfortune and circumstaneces are the only reason
We the ones who get trapped most
The okey doke, green tricks, rope a dope, mass incarceration
Exactly what htey was hoping for
Yo

Don’t get caught up in the trap nigga
The hood is just a set up
That’s a fact nigga
Want us dead or in jail that’s a fact nigga
You black so you better watch your back nigga

Don’t get caught up in the trap nigga
The hood is just a set up
That’s a fact nigga
Want us dead or in jail that’s a fact nigga
You black so you better watch your back nigga

Every since they gave us the bible
They created the cycle
Your head is on the chopping block like Pac, Bill, and Michael
They want to decapitate us or either emasculate us
Trayvon and Mike Brown the only thing that were activators
Only reactionary other people acting scary
Drown our troubles in the bottle cause that’s how we tackle worries
It ain’t nothing but a thing when a homie is killed
But when Marks Luke and shoot when the police widow
We don’t even pull our dollars for some economic power
Instead we give our money to the people that don’t like us
We would die cry complain till kingdom come
But if we don’t act we gonna keep losing on every front

Don’t get caught up in the trap nigga
The hood is just a set up
That’s a fact nigga
Want us dead or in jail that’s a fact nigga
You black so you better watch your back nigga

Don’t get caught up in the trap nigga
The hood is just a set up
That’s a fact nigga
Want us dead or in jail that’s a fact nigga
You black so you better watch your back nigga

Yeah man we gotta stop falling for the same bullshit, you feel me?
We know it’s a set up

Gotta be smarter than that
